trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties that event-driven activities must derive from, to subscribe to events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece propriedades e métodos dos quais atividades controladas por evento devem derivar para poderem assinar eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> on which the activity is waiting for data to arrive.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> no qual a atividade está aguardando os dados chegarem.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> on which the activity is waiting for data to arrive.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> no qual a atividade está aguardando para os dados chegam.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> que representa o ambiente de execução do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> para o evento pai.

trans-unit.source: Creates the subscription of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cria a assinatura de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity.Subscribe%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the FileWatcher SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo FileWatcher SDK do arquivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [atividade do Inspetor de sistema de arquivo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> que representa o ambiente de execução do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> para o evento pai.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the subscription of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a assinatura de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity.Unsubscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity.Unsubscribe%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the FileWatcher SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo FileWatcher SDK do arquivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [atividade do Inspetor de sistema de arquivo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
